meanings.sent1: The plain and unpoetic language of the manual made it easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: Her unpoetic writing style focused more on facts than emotions.
meanings.sent3: The unpoetic grocery list read like a boring novel.
meanings.sent4: His unpoetic speech was like a dry desert with no oasis of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The unpoetic landscape lacked the beauty of poetic inspiration.

meanings.definition: Not suitable for or conducive to poetry.
meanings.sent1: The noisy construction site was an unpoetic setting for a romantic poem.
meanings.sent2: The unpoetic environment of the office stifled her creative writing.
meanings.sent3: The unpoetic cafeteria menu offered no poetic flavors to savor.
meanings.sent4: The unpoetic atmosphere of the courtroom drained all artistic inspiration.
meanings.sent5: The unpoetic cityscape was a canvas devoid of poetic colors.
